titleStmt.title: Cupids tragedy: Eibng [sic] Corydon's courtship; or, Philomels exaltation. Tothe [sic] tune of, The new Bory; or, Will you be a man of fashion.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for P[hilip]. Brooksby, at the Golden-ball, in West-smithfield.,

notesStmt.note: Place, date of publication, and publisher's name from Wing.
The second 't' in 'Tothe' [sic] in the title is printed upside down.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
